item.title: Paramount Skydance makes $108.4 billion bid for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount Skydance's $30 per share offer comes just days after Netflix agreed to buy parts of Warner Bros. in a deal valued at $82.7 billion.

item.title: WATCH: Behind the scenes of 'Monsters Funday Football'
item.description: The characters of "Monsters, Inc." join in on the fun ahead of tonight's "Monday Night Football" game between the Eagles and Chargers.

item.title: Records reviewed by AP detail online monitoring, arrests in New Orleans immigration crackdown
item.description: State and federal authorities are monitoring online criticism and protests against the immigration crackdown in New Orleans.
